security: Revealing the CIA’s inability to identify a subject of interest and acknowledging intelligence requests could compromise ongoing investigations. Quoting directly: “REGRET UNABLE IDENTIFY SUBJ. HEZD MORE BI.” This admission of limited intelligence could be exploited by adversaries.
summary: A message from the Director to Paris and Madrid stations indicating an inability to identify a subject related to a request for traces on Jorge XA. FERALDEZ, referencing previous communication PARI 1548.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET classified message, dated June 22, 1962, from the Director to the Paris and Madrid CIA stations, indicates a failure to identify a subject related to a previous request (PARI 1548) for traces on Jorge XA. FERALDEZ, with the message noting, "REGRET UNABLE IDENTIFY SUBJ. HEZD MORE BI."
title: KEYWAY PURUBEN UNRUMBLE Regarding PARI 1548
